altTitles.en: The Best Medical God in the City

altTitles.ja: 一族を滅ぼされた俺が最強の力を手に入れて帰ってきた

description.en:
Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously. Now, and the trash Ye Chen is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" 

This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky!

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

description.en:
It's divided to three arcs:  
Arc 1: Unhuman (不是人)  
Arc 2: Me Lowly Woman (賤妾)  
Arc 3: The Final Keystone (終礎)

altTitles.ja: 義妹生活

description.en:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
description.pt-br:
De colegas de classe a irmão e irmã, vivendo sob o mesmo teto.

Após o novo casamento de seu pai, Asamura Yuuta acaba ganhando uma nova meia-irmã, coincidentemente a beleza número um do ano escolar, Ayase Saki. Tendo aprendido valores importantes no que diz respeito aos relacionamentos homem-mulher através dos anteriores de seus pais, eles prometem um ao outro não ser muito próximos, não ser muito opostos e apenas manter uma distância vaga e confortável.

Por um lado, Saki, que trabalhou sozinha pelo bem de sua família, não sabe como confiar adequadamente nos outros, enquanto Yuta não tem certeza de como realmente tratá-la. Estando em terreno bastante igual, os dois aprendem lentamente a sensação confortável de viver juntos.

O relacionamento deles evolui lentamente de estranhos à medida que os dias passam. Eventualmente, isso pode acabar em uma história sobre o amor, pelo que sabemos.

altTitles.ja: 見えてますよ！　愛沢さん

description.en:
Michi, plagued forever by her ability to see ghosts, pretends like she can't in order to avoid them at all costs. But recently she found a ghost she just can't ignore: Aizawa Honami, ex-classmate and ex-member of the famous idol group De:LPhinus, hanging around school from some lingering attachment.

Still, no matter what ghost it is, Michi's not getting involved. Though while she steels her heart, her eyes keep coming back to Honami's bizarre antics and passionate fanservice...(?)
description.id:
Michi, diganggu selamanya oleh kemampuannya untuk melihat hantu, berpura-pura seperti dia tidak bisa melihat mereka untuk menghindari mereka bagaimanaoun itu.

Tapi baru-baru ini dia menemukan hantu yang tidak bisa dia abaikan:
Aizawa Honami, mantan teman sekelas dan mantan anggota grup idola terkenal De:LPhinus, berkeliaran di sekolah karena keterikatan yang masih melekat.

Tetap saja, tidak peduli hantu apa itu, Michi tidak terlibat.
Meskipun saat dia menguatkan hatinya, matanya terus kembali ke kejenakaan aneh dan fanservice Honami yang penuh gairah...(?)
description.ja:
昔から幽霊が見えることに悩まされていたみちは、なるべく関わらないよう見えないフリを続けていた。

しかし、そんな彼女でも無視できない幽霊が最近出てきた。それは大人気アイドルグループ「De:LPhinus」の元メンバー、愛沢ほなみ。クラスメイトでもあった彼女は、未練から教室に出るようになったのだ。

相手が誰であれ、幽霊である以上関わらない。そう決意するみちではあるが、ほなみの幼稚で破天荒な行動と熱烈なファンサービス（？）に気付けば目で追っていて……。
description.es-la:
Michi, maldecida para siempre con la capacidad de ver fantasmas, finge que no puede verlos precisamente porque quiere evitarlos a toda costa.

Pero recientemente se encontró con un fantasma que no puede ignorar: Aizawa Honami, excompañera de clase y ex miembro del famoso grupo de Idols "De:LPhinus", quien también era compañera de clase, comenzó a aparecer en el salón de clases por algún motivo.

Aun así, no importa qué fantasmas sean, Michi no quiere involucrarse. Mientras protege su corazón, sus ojos continúan observando las payasadas y el fanservice (?) de Honami.
description.pt-br:
Michi, amaldiçoada para sempre pela habilidade de enxergar fantasmas, finge que não pode vê-los justamente porque quer evitá-los a todo custo.

Mas recentemente ela encontrou um fantasma que não pode ignorar:
Aizawa Honami, ex-colega de classe e ex-membro do famoso grupo de idols De:LPhinus, fica perambulando em torno da escola com ainda algum tipo de vínculo.

Ainda assim, não importa o que fantasmas são, Michi não quer se envolver.
Enquanto ela blinda seu coração, seus olhos continuam a observar as travessuras e fanservide de Honami.

description.en: All we have left to do is eat.

title.en: Shoujo-tachi no Kizuato ni Kuchizuke wo

altTitles.ja: 少女たちの痕にくちづけを

altTitles.en: Kiss the Scars of the Girls

description.en: The girls spend their time at a school built in a deep forest. Their secret is that they are all vampires. In order to hunt without being noticed by humans, the girls are bonded by blood, and what does the "sisterhood" bring to them?
description.pt-br: As meninas passam o tempo em uma escola construída em uma floresta profunda. O segredo delas é que todas são vampiras. Para caçar sem serem notadas pelos humanos, as meninas são ligadas por sangue, e o que a "irmandade" traz para elas?

altTitles.ja: 不揃いの連理

description.en:
Tanaka Iori is a worker for a company that sets unreasonable demands, on top of that she has a penchant for dating married men. What a recipe for disaster! One day she gets drunk with an acquaintance and wakes up the next morning by her side naked! What's Iori to do?  
  
- [Part 1 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1030773596430327808)
- [Part 2 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1044057437831979008)
- [Part 3 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1065586182698889216)

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.fr: Dans une certaine lycée se trouve un certain club et ses trois managers. Bien qu'anodins, des jours comme on n'en trouve nulle part ailleurs voient le jour ! Dessiné par Yamamoto Souichiro : une toute nouvelle histoire de jeunesse sur le thème du sport !
description.tl: Nakatakda sa beysbol klab ng isang hayskul, ito ay isang "kwentong pagdadalaga sa gilid," na nakatuon sa tatlong tagapamahala ng koponan na may napakaibang mga personalidad: si Nagisa, na halos hindi alam ang mga patakaran ng beysbol; si Ichinose, isang magarbo na gyaru; at si Himemiya, ang tahimik na babae na may nakakagulat na masamang pag-uugali.
description.vi: Slice of life của ba em quản lí CLB thể thao ở một trường cao trung nào đó... Để xem có gì hay!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

altTitles.ja: なでしこドレミソラ

description.en:
Miya Nekoma made a bold high school debut in an attempt to change from her once "infamously" boring self. As a part of the change, she decided to join the school's Light Music Club, but on her way to sign up she is intercepted by the energetic shakuhachi flute player Hiyo Takemi who introduces her to the world of Wagakki, or traditional Japanese instruments. After the two attend a concert from one of Japan's leading traditional/modern fusion bands, Miya becomes enamored with the Tsugaru-shamisen, a three stringed lute.  
  
With Hiyo by her side, Miya delves into the world of traditional Japanese music as new acquaintances and friends help to make her dream of sharing the sound she loves a reality.

title.en: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.pt-br: Não É Minha Culpa Não Ser Popular!

description.en:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.
description.pt-br:
Tomoko Kuroki naturalmente presumiu que ela seria popular quando chegasse ao ensino médio... mas então a realidade fria e dura se abateu para o ataque! Acontece que todos os pontos de popularidade que ela acumulou em seus simuladores de namoro de videogame valem a pena na vida real, e Tomoko está longe de estar preparada para passar pelo ensino médio!

Como ela pode esperar impressionar seus colegas quando ela nem consegue falar com eles?! Nasce uma nova heroína do ensino médio (talvez?)!

altTitles.ja: 救済の日

description.en:
Nishioka Kyoudai's anti-war epic, told in their signature surrealist style.   
  
A man wakes up one morning to find the world outside of his house a wasteland. As he searches for signs of life, he finds a fetus in a ditch, which promptly latches onto his thumb and won't let go, and things only get stranger from there…

altTitles.ja: 日替わり尻尾の尾崎ちゃん

description.en: A high school girl, Shiho Ozaki, whose tail grows back every day. Invited by her, a senior who visits the PE storage room almost daily finds himself at her mercy, with her tail, her ears, and whatever else she decides to do.
description.ja: 毎日尻尾が生え変わる女子高生、尾崎詩穂（おざきしほ）。彼女の誘いで毎日のように体育倉庫を訪れる先輩は、今日も尻尾で、耳で、なすがままにされてしまう。

altTitles.ja: ヤンキー高校にお嬢様

altTitles.en: The Young Lady in a Delinquent High School

description.en:
Kiryuuin Yuri, a rich young lady, transfers to Mitsuya Private High School, a den of delinquents.

Her goal is to meet real delinquents and have heated one-on-one fights, like those in the delinquent manga she adores. However, contrary to her ideal, the reality is that she is surrounded by "trash" who are too presumptuous to even be called delinquents...

Bullies who rule the class, voyeurs who infest the train to school, abusive breeder in the neighborhood. 

A new refreshing action series begins as this lovely young lady beats up the scums in order to reach the top─!
description.ja: 悪名高い超不良高校に転校してきたのは可憐なお嬢様！？

description.en: With no savings, average qualifications, and a bank balance consistently below 10,000 won, can the Backbone Breaker Gye Baeksun really escape unemployment?

altTitles.ja: 魔女と傭兵
Majo to Youhei

altTitles.th: แม่มดกับทหารรับจ้าง

altTitles.vi: Phù thuỷ và Lính đánh thuê

description.en:
Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. "I want you to protect me," she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10570/episode/350366)
[Official X Account](https://x.com/witch_mercenary)
description.fr: Zig, un mercenaire grand et large d'épaules, participe à une chasse aux sorcières. Après un duel acharné avec la sorcière redoutable, il découvre son désir. "Je veux que tu me protèges," demande-t-elle, fatiguée que sa vie soit prise à la légère. Cherchant un endroit pour survivre, la sorcière et le mercenaire tournent leurs regards vers un continent inconnu !
description.ja:
魔女討伐に参加した“双刃の傭兵”ジグ。死闘の果てに見た魔女の素顔は彼の想像とは異なるものだった。

「あなたに、私の護衛を依頼します」

命を狙われない場所を渇望する魔女、シアーシャ。二人は、未知なる異大陸への渡航を決意する。だがそこは、失われた魔術や凶悪な魔獣が蔓延る平穏とは程遠い異世界で…!?
description.vi:
「Phù thủy」――― Tại Lục địa nơi mà Ma thú lẫn Ma thuật đều đã hoàn toàn biến mất, Phù thủy trở thành thứ sinh vật bí ẩn duy nhất còn tồn tại.

Gig Crain, một Lính đánh thuê sở hữu thân hình cường tráng, đang trên đường tiến tới chinh phạt thứ tồn tại đáng sợ từ thời cổ xưa đó. Khi trận giao chiến khốc liệt khép lại, mặc dù đã giành chiến thắng đầy nhọc nhằn, anh cũng chẳng còn mục đích để xuống tay với Phù thủy nữa. Khi Gig không định kết liễu mà cứ thế rời đi, từ sau bóng lưng anh, Phù thủy có một yêu cầu...

"Tôi muốn anh bảo vệ tôi". Cô mong muốn được sống trong cảnh không bị truy đuổi. Tự giằng co ít lâu, Gig cuối cùng cũng đã chấp thuận yêu cầu đó. Tuy nhiên, không có nơi nào trên Lục địa này mà một Phù thủy, biểu tượng của sự sợ hãi, có thể sống yên ổn. Dẫu vậy, khi việc di chuyển giữa các Lục địa trở nên khả thi trong những năm gần đây, Phù thủy và Lính đánh thuê đã quyết định sẽ lên đường đi tới một Lục địa khác.

Tác phẩm Light Novel được chuyển thể từ Web Novel, nay đã có phiên bản Manga cùng tên!!
description.es-la: Zig, un mercenario alto y de anchos hombros, participa en una caza de brujas. Tras un feroz duelo con la mortífera bruja, se entera de su deseo. "Quiero que me protejas", le pide ella, cansada de que trivialicen su vida. En busca de un lugar donde sobrevivir, la bruja y el mercenario ponen sus miras en un continente desconocido.

altTitles.ja: ビリーバット

altTitles.th: บิลลี่ แบ็ท

description.en:
Billy Bat is a comic-in-a-comic and the real protagonist is a Japanese-American artist named Kevin Yamagata who draws Billy Bat for "Marble Comics". Shortly after they transition to the artist in his studio with his assistant, two actual detectives, looking like Laurel and Hardy in Dick Tracy era suits and trench coats, knock on the door and appropriate Kevin's room for the purpose of conducting surveillance on a room in an adjacent building. 

One of the detectives, the skinny "Laurel", sees Kevin's work and it turns out he's a Billy Bat fan. The other chubby "Hardy" detective picks up a page saying that the characters look familiar and accuses Kevin of translating an old "Jap" comic.  
As Hardy remembers the comic he thinks Kevin is ripping off, we make another Urasawaesque time jump to 1949 Tokyo…
description.pl: "Billy Bat" przedstawia losy japońsko-amerykańskiego artysty Kevina Yamagaty, autora mangi o identycznym tytule co dzieło, w którym sam występuje, czyli "Billy Bat". Pracuje dla wydawnictwa "Marble Comics". Pewnego dnia do jego mieszkania pukają dwaj detektywi wyglądający jak Laurel Hardy z "Dick Tracy". Informują go, że otrzymali od gospodarza zezwolenie na przeprowadzenie śledztwa sąsiadującego budynku. Wkrótce jeden z detektywów, chudzielec Laurel, zauważa prace Kevina i okazuje się fanem "Billy'ego Bata", podczas gdy otyły Hardy podnosi pojedynczą stronę ze stwierdzeniem, iż komiks wygląda zadziwiająco podobnie do mangi publikowanej niegdyś przez Jumpa. Oskarża bohatera o kradzież tokijskiego dzieła z 1949 roku.
description.es-la:
Billy Bat es un cómic en un cómic y el verdadero protagonista es un artista japonés-americano llamado Kevin Yamagata que dibuja a Billy Bat para "Marble Comics". Poco después pasan al artista en su estudio con su ayudante, dos detectives reales que parecen Laurel y Hardy con trajes y gabardinas de la época de Dick Tracy, llaman a la puerta y se apropian de la habitación de Kevin con el fin de realizar una vigilancia en una habitación de un edificio adyacente. 

Uno de los detectives, el flaco "Laurel", ve el trabajo de Kevin y resulta que es un fanático de Billy Bat. El otro detective, el regordete "Hardy", coge una página diciendo que los personajes le resultan familiares y acusa a Kevin de traducir un viejo cómic "japonés".  
Mientras Hardy recuerda el cómic que cree que Kevin está copiando, hacemos otro salto temporal Urasawaesco al Tokio de 1949...
description.pt-br: Um detetive particular, é o protagonista da história em quadrinhos feita por Kevin Yamagata, um quadrinista americano, descendente de japoneses, famoso por sua história “Billy Bat”. O cotidiano de Kevin é abruptamente ado quando dois detetives entram no estúdio dele, a fim de investigar um vizinho acusado de espionagem. Um desses detetives vê o personagem Billy Bat e diz ter visto aquele desenho enquanto trabalhava no Japão. Suspeitando ter visto o personagem enquanto morava lá e o roubado inconscientemente, Kevin regressa ao Japão para buscar a verdade.

title.en: I'm the Villainess, but I'm Being Captured by the Heroine?! Anthology

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢ですが、ヒロインに攻略されてますわ!? アンソロジーコミック
悪役令嬢ですが、ヒロインに攻略されてますわ!?

Akuyaku Reijou Desu ga, Hiroin ni Kouryaku Sarete Masu wa!? Anthology Comic

altTitles.en: I'm the Villainess, but I'm Being Captured by the Heroine?!
I'm the Villainess, but the Heroine's Trying to Capture Me?! Anthology Comic
I'm the Villainess, but the Heroine's Trying to Capture Me?!

altTitles.uk: Я лиходійка, але серце моє полонила героїня!?

description.en:
An anthology featuring a variety of stories with girl × girl relationships, with a focus on Heroine × Villainess! Heroines and villainesses, maids and villainesses… 5 stories featuring relationships between girls and their bonds can be found in this anthology. A collection of stories that were published on *Shousetsuka ni Narou*! All have happy endings!

Cover Art: Maro

**Volume 1 Contents:**  
1. **The Heroine's Capture Target Is…** (ヒロインの攻略対象は……), Art by Kawano Akiko, Story by yui/south², [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8335ef/).
The villainess' engagement is broken at an evening party. Called by the prince, what will the heroine do…?! *Has GL ending.*
2. **Milady Looked Extremely Troubled When Her Engagement Was Broken, so I Stepped in to Help Her** (婚約破棄されたお嬢様が大変そうなので助けに入りました), Art by Ooba Soto, Story by Ringoame Tsuin, [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9459fo/).
The lady she served had her engagement broken before her very eyes?!
3.  **My Best Friend's Engagement Was Broken. I Need to Do My Best to Stop It! …But I Was the Reason Behind It…** (婚約破棄されました。私の親友が!必ず阻止します!……私が原因なのでorz), Art by Wani, Story by naturalsoft, [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3379dw/).
I thought I could avoid the condemnation scene after becoming friends with the villainess, but…?! *Has GL ending.*
4. **My Friendship Route With the Villainess** (悪役令嬢との友情ルート), Art by Hoshina, Story by Taikoban, [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9052ee/).
The reincarnated heroine aims to save the villainess?! Using knowledge from the original work, she becomes acquainted with the villainess…
5. **The "Villainess'" Engagement Braking, or an Account of the "Dark Saint" ~Another Story~** (“悪役"令嬢の婚約破棄、もしくは〈黒の聖女〉顛末記~another story~), Art by Murasaki, Story by Fujiyama, [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7544cy/).
 All of the villainess' actions are for the sake of the heroine…

**Volume 2 Contents:**
1. **The Villainess Receives a Pledge of Love From an Adorable, Beautiful Rival** (悪役令嬢は天使のようなライバル美少女に愛を誓われる). By Michiyuki Aoi. *Has GL ending.*
2. **Since I Was Reincarnated as the Villainess, I Wanted to Be Kind to the Heroine to Avoid Being Banished From the Country, but She Is So Slow, Clumsy, and Dumb That I Had to Play the Straight Man and Be Strict With Her, Which — Sure Enough — Resulted in My Fiancé, the Prince, Condemning Me at the Graduation Party** (悪役令嬢に転生したので、国外追放回避の為ヒロインに優しく接したいが、ヒロインが鈍臭くてボケボケなので厳しく接してツッコミまくっていたら、案の定卒業パーティーで婚約者である王子から断罪されている最中です). Art by Kashi Aoi, Story by Mon-chan. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6610gi/). *Has GL ending.*
3. 「愛することはない」と言われましても、そもそもその必要はございません。 Art by Manatamayumu, Story by 鰯づくし. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2695hy/).
4. **A Commoner Like Me Got Tangled up With a Haughty Villainess, What Should I Do?** (平民の私が高慢な悪役令嬢に絡まれているのですが、どうすればいいですか？). Art by Hoshina, Story by Ringoame Tsuin. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2667gs/). *Has GL ending.*
5. わたくしこそが王となりますゆえ、此度の縁談はお断りさせていただきますわ。かわいい妹が待っておりますの. Art by Fuyume Saya, Story by Nakamura Syuri. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1179hz/).
description.id:
Antologi yang menampilkan berbagai cerita dengan hubungan cewek x cewek, dengan fokus pada Heroine x Villainess! Pahlawan dan penjahat, pelayan dan penjahat … 5 cerita yang menampilkan hubungan antara perempuan dan ikatan mereka dapat ditemukan dalam antologi ini. Kumpulan cerita yang diterbitkan di Shousetsuka ni Narou! Semua memiliki akhir yang bahagia!

1. Target dari sang heroine adalah…
2. Sepertinya nona sedang dalam Bahaya ketika pertunangannya dibatalkan, jadi aku akan membantu beliau
3. Pertunangan teman dekatku telah dibatalkan. Aku harus menemukan cara untuk mencegahnya… Namun ternyata akulah alasan hal itu terjadi…
4. Rute pertemananku dengan sang tokoh antagonis
5. Pembatalan pertunangan sang tokoh antagonis. Adalah rencana dari sang "Darkness Saintess" ~Another Story~
description.ja:
ヒロイン×悪役令嬢を中心とした女性同士の物語を集めた小説家になろう発アンソロジー!
ALLハッピーエンドの読み切り5本収録!! いずれも『小説家になろう』発の大人気作です!
王子様と幸せになるだけがハッピーエンドじゃない!
婚約破棄からのヒロイン×悪役令嬢ルートを中心に、ざまぁ、断罪イベント、GL、乙女ゲーム、友情END、百合END、主従ENDなどが楽しめます♪
カバーイラスト：まろ

**第1巻の内容：**
1. 『ヒロインの攻略対象は……』　漫画：かわのあきこ　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8335ef/)：yui/サウスのサウス
悪役令嬢が婚約破棄された時、王子に呼ばれたヒロインの行動は!?
2. 『婚約破棄されたお嬢様が大変そうなので助けに入りました』　漫画：大庭そと　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9459fo/)：りんご飴ツイン
お仕えしているお嬢様が目の前で婚約破棄され!?
3. 『婚約破棄されました。私の親友が!必ず阻止します!……私が原因なのでorz』　漫画：わに　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3379dw/)： naturalsoft
悪役令嬢と親友になって断罪回避と思ったのに!?
4. 『悪役令嬢との友情ルート』　漫画：ほしな　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9052ee/)：大小判
転生したヒロインの目的は悪役令嬢の救済!? 原作知識を使って悪役令嬢に近づき…。
5. 『“悪役"令嬢の婚約破棄、もしくは〈黒の聖女〉顛末記~another story~』　漫画：むらさき　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7544cy/)：ふじやま
悪役令嬢の行動のすべてはヒロインの為に――…。

**第2巻の内容：**
1. 『悪役令嬢は天使のようなライバル美少女に愛を誓われる』　漫画：道雪葵
2. 『悪役令嬢に転生したので、国外追放回避の為ヒロインに優しく接したいが、ヒロインが鈍臭くてボケボケなので厳しく接してツッコミまくっていたら、案の定卒業パーティーで婚約者である王子から断罪されている最中です』　漫画：かしい葵　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6610gi/)：もんちゃん
3. 『「愛することはない」と言われましても、そもそもその必要はございません。』　漫画：マナタマユム　　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2695hy/)：鰯づくし
4. 『平民の私が高慢な悪役令嬢に絡まれているのですが、どうすればいいですか？』　漫画：ほしな　　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2667gs/)：りんご飴ツイン
5. 『わたくしこそが王となりますゆえ、此度の縁談はお断りさせていただきますわ。かわいい妹が待っておりますの』　漫画：冬芽沙也　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1179hz/)：中村朱里
description.uk:
Антологія історій про дівочу дружбу, зосереджених на дружбі між Героїнею та Лиходійкою! Героїні та лиходійки, служниці та лиходійки… 5 історій про стосунки між дівчатами та їхні узи. Збірка оповідань, опублікованих на Shousetsuka ni Narou! Всі зі щасливим кінцем!

Том зміст:
1. Об'єкт захоплення героїні це -...
2. Через розрив заручин міледі виглядала стурбованою, тож я вирішила її підтримати
3. Заручини моєї найкращої подруги розірвані. Мені потрібно зробити все можливе, щоб виправити це! …Але ж саме я стала причиною цього…
4. Історія моєї дружби із лиходійкою.
5. Розрив заручин лиходійки, або Розповідь про "Темну Святу". Інша історія
description.pt-br: Uma antologia com uma variedade de histórias sobre relacionamentos garota x garota, com foco em Heroína x Vilã! Heroínas e vilãs, empregadas domésticas e vilãs... 5 histórias sobre relacionamentos entre garotas e seus vínculos podem ser encontradas nesta antologia. Uma coleção de histórias publicadas no *Shousetsuka ni Narou!* Todos têm finais felizes!

title.en: I Found A Family That Wasn’t In My Adoption Plan

description.en:
She was the most competent secretary of the Brauno family, the most prestigious in the empire,
but one day, she was betrayed and killed by a hitman…!

Was it because of the resentment she faced for not being a noble?
Or because of her desire to become one?

She reincarnated as Aerin, the seven-year-old illegitimate granddaughter of the Brauno family!!

However, even as this child, she’s destined to be adopted and killed by the same man who betrayed her in her previous life.

No way! Before I die by his hands, I’ll get adopted by someone else!

Huh? All I wanted was to be adopted, but now…

Wealth, honor, and even a new family that wasn’t part of the adoption plan come as a package deal.
“Aerin! Take me!”
“No, I already have too much….”
“It’s fine if you just add me to your endless list of assets.”
“But how could I possibly take in a prince…?”

At this point, should I just take over not only the family but the entire empire too?

title.en: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island with Four Beautiful Girls

description.en: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！
___
- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

title.en: Sekai de Ichiban "Kawaii" Amamiya-san, Nibanme wa Ore.

altTitles.ja: 世界で一番『可愛い』雨宮さん、二番目は俺。

altTitles.en: The World's Most "Cutest" is Amamiya-san, and the Second is Me.

altTitles.id: Yang Paling " IMUT" di Dunia adalah Amamiya-san, dan Yang Kedua adalah Aku.

altTitles.vi: Người “dễ thương” nhất thế giới là Amamiya, đứng thứ hai là tôi.

description.en: Hikari, a highly popular model hailed as the "Cutest Girl in the World"... The mysterious model turned out to be an ordinary high school student named Harema Kouki! Kouki is troubled by the fact that he feels he's too cute when cross-dressing and can't find other girls cute... But by a twist of fate, he realizes that his classmate, Amamiya-san, is much cuter than him—!?
description.id: Hikari, model yang sangat populer dan dijuluki sebagai "Gadis Termanis di Dunia" Model misterius ini ternyata seorang siswa SMA biasa bernama Harema Kouki! Kouki merasa terganggu oleh fakta bahwa dia merasa dirinya terlalu imut ketika ber-crossdressing dan tidak dapat menemukan gadis-gadis lain yang imut... Namun, karena takdir, dia menyadari bahwa teman sekelasnya, Amamiya-san, jauh lebih imut darinya! Seorang anak laki-laki yang terlalu percaya diri saat Crossdresser × seorang gadis rajin yang bersinar saat dipoles, Komedi romantis anak muda yang dipenuhi dengan "keimutan" -!
description.ja:
「君は俺より可愛い！つまり世界で一番可愛い！」

『世界一可愛い女の子』と称される大人気美少女モデルのhikari――。謎に包まれた彼女の正体はどこにでもいる普通の高校生、晴間光輝だった！女装した自分が可愛すぎて他の女子を可愛いと思えないことに悩んでいる光輝だったが、ある日クラスメイトの地味で冴えない雨宮さんが自分より『可愛い』ことに気づいてしまい――!?
description.vi: Hikari, một người mẫu rất nổi tiếng với biệt danh "cô gái dễ thương nhất thế giới" hóa ra là một học sinh trung học tên Kouki. Cậu lo sợ rằng mình sẽ không thích ai được nữa bởi vì làm gì có người con gái nào dễ thương hơn mình. Nhưng đọc lại tên truyện đi ông nhõi, chú mày xếp thứ 2 thôi.

title.en: Shiori Experience: My Plain Self and an Odd Old Man

altTitles.ja-ro: Shiori Experience - Jimi na Watashi to Hen na Ojisan

altTitles.ja: SHIORI EXPERIENCE ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~
シオリエクスペリエンス  ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~

altTitles.ru: Shiori Experience: незаурядный Джими и заурядная Я

altTitles.uk: Досвід Шіорі ~Джимі, я і дивний дядько~

description.en:
Shiori was once a guitarist in a light music club in high school. But her first live performance was dashed when her brother ran away from home with a lot of debt, to become a musician in Tokyo.  
  
A decade later, Shiori is now a high school teacher, leading a boring, uneventful life and paying off the debt… till she runs into the ghost of none other than a famous guitarist Jim-you-know-who.  
  
A story of a 27-year-old woman on her way to a music legend begins here.
description.ru: История о Шиори, скромной и неуклюжей 27-летней школьной учительнице, которая любит играть на гитаре и общается с призраком Джими Хендрикса.
description.pt-br: Shiori era uma guitarrista em um clube de música no colégio. Mas sua primeira apresentação ao vivo foi frustrada quando seu irmão fugiu de casa deixando um monte de dívidas para se tornar um músico em Tóquio. Uma década depois, Shiori é agora uma professora do ensino médio, levando uma vida monótona e entediante pagando as dívidas... Até ela dar de cara com o fantasma de ninguém menos que um famoso guitarrista chamado Jim-você-sabe-quem. A história de uma mulher de 27 anos de idade, a caminho de uma lenda musical começa aqui.

title.en: Akagi: The Genius Who Fell Into Darkness

altTitles.ja: アカギ－闇に降り立った天才
闘牌伝説アカギ 闇に舞い降りた天才

description.en: The year is 1958, in the midst of a period of rapid economic growth. One rainy night at a mahjong parlor, Nangou, who was challenging the yakuza to a life-threatening game, was gradually being pushed into a corner. Suddenly, a soaking wet boy walks into the parlor. Nangou senses something extraordinary in him, and asks the boy, who has never even held a mahjong tile before, to play in his place. This is when the legend began. The boy's name was Akagi Shigeru, later known as the "Man of the Divine Realm."

title.en: RTA Sousha wa Game Sekai kara Kaerenai

altTitles.ja: RTA走者はゲーム世界から帰れない

altTitles.en: Speedrunner Cannot Return from the Game World
RTA Runner Cannot Return from the Game World
The RTA Runner Can't Return From The Game World

altTitles.ja-ro: RTA Sousha ha Game Sekai kara Kaerenai

altTitles.vi: Bị nhốt trong thế giới game, tôi "speedrun" sạch map

description.en: Our protagonist, the speedrunning emperor of *Another Verse*, suddenly feels sleepy in the middle of practice. When he awakens, the familiar opening of *Another Verse* is playing right before his eyes!? In this godly environment where his body is moving better than usual, he has to speedrun! Clearing the game world faster than anyone! Abusing bugs to fight, the fastest isekai fantasy!!
description.ja:
「アナザーバース」RTA世界王者である主人公は、練習中に急に眠気に襲われてしまう。
目を覚ますと目の前には見慣れた「アナザーバース」のオープニングが――!?
いつもより体が動くこの神環境なら、RTAするしかない！

ゲームの世界を誰よりも早くクリアせよ！
バグ技を駆使して戦う、”””最速”””の異世界ファンタジー!!

description.en:
Omegaverse story

^^This comics is based on fiction and any similarity to real people, places, or events is purely coincidental^^

Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.

altTitles.ja: ホタルの嫁入り

description.en: A romance story set in the Meiji era. Born into a prestigious family and blessed with good looks, Satoko is said to have a short life expectancy. But suddenly, her life is targeted by a mysterious killer...?! In order to survive on the spot, Satoko makes a "proposal" for the killer...?! - A young lady and an assassin... A contract marriage love suspense between two people who should never meet!
description.es:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.ja:
令嬢と殺し屋…絶対交わらないはずの二人の、契約結婚ラブサスペンス！
時は明治。
名家に生まれ美貌に恵まれるも、余命わずかと言われている紗都子の唯一の夢は…家の利益になる結婚をすること。
しかし突然、謎の殺し屋に命を狙われ…！？
その場を生き延びるため、紗都子は殺し屋にある“提案”を…！？
description.uk: "Весілля світлячків" – манґа, події якої розгортаються у давні часи епохи Мейджі. Дівчина на ім'я Сатоко, донька заможної родини, якій пощастило успадкувати красу, прагне одружитися з тим, кого запропонує їй батько, але як же це зробити, якщо її життю загрожує хвороба? Одного дня героїня потрапляє до рук викрадачів, де, задля порятунку себе, вона пропонує шлюб власному вбивці. Куди її приведе узгоджений шлюб з людиною, яку вона ніколи не мала зустріти?
description.es-la:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de romance ambientada na era Meiji.  

Nascida em uma família de prestígio e abençoada com boa aparência, Satoko tem uma expectativa de vida curta. Mas de repente, sua vida é alvo de um misterioso assassino...?! Para sobreviver no local, Satoko faz uma "proposta" para o assassino...?! 
- Uma jovem e um assassino... 

Um suspense de amor por contrato de casamento entre duas pessoas que nunca deveriam se encontrar!
description.zh-hk:
千金小姐與殺手…絕對沒有交集的兩個人間的契約結婚愛情喜劇！
時值明治時代。
出生名門又集美貌於一身，卻被告知餘命不久矣的紗都子唯一的夢想是…為了家族的利益而結婚。
但是，突然之間被謎樣的殺手給襲擊了…！？
為了從這種局面中活下來，紗都子向殺手提出了某項“提案”…！？

title.en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King

altTitles.en: The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World

altTitles.ru: История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире

altTitles.ja: 異世界剣王生存記

altTitles.th: การเอาชีวิตรอดของราชาดาบในต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Survival Story of a Sword King in a Fantasy World

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM)
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)

description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

description.en: A boy named Ruisha is trapped in a distorted space created by the ancient hero. What he finds there is the Demon King and the Dragon King, who should have been defeated by the hero 300 years ago. Ruisha befriends the Demon King and the Dragon King, and is trained by them, going from a weak child to a legendary warrior with the power of both demons and dragons. Using his power, Ruisha escaped from the strange place and was accepted into the magic academy where the hero’s descendants live. And now he will have to face many challenges to free the Demon King and Dragon King.
description.ja:
「魔王」と「竜王」の力を継ぐ少年の無双ファンタジー！
才能ゼロの少年ルイシャは、ある日謎の穴に落ちてしまう。その先にいたのは、巨乳で美人の「魔王」と褐色幼女の「竜王」！　2人から300年の修行を受け、少年は魔族と竜族の力に覚醒する！　ちょっとだけHな少年の英雄譚が、タテ読みフルカラーで開幕！

description.en:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.

Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.

Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

description.en: Author Takeda Super regretted not having drawn the threesome so much that he decided to redraw and make it happen, thereby retconning the original Chapters 31–35. Equivalent to the [main story](https://mangadex.org/title/a08d63ba-c412-4a7b-94b8-ef65bf2e2a30)'s Volume 4, this is a collection of said chapters, from the original, pure-love timeline, that were published in Young Magazine but didn't make it into the main volumes because they were retconned. It also includes a newly drawn Chapter 36 that shows how things would have continued had they not been redrawn, contributed illustrations, an article about sluts, and Takeda Super's debut work, *Way Of Life*.
description.vi:
Lúc đầu tác giả Takeda Super đã theo con đường chính đạo Rom thuần cho bộ này. Nhưng rồi ổng quá hối tiếc vì đã không vẽ tri sâm Agawa và chị tịch đến nỗi tác giả đã quyết định vẽ lại từ chap 31. Và rồi, ra mắt cùng lúc với vol 5 của "Crush Của Tôi Là Một Đứa Lẳng Lơ" vào 12/2024 chính là đây: một vol tổng hợp các chương trước khi vẽ lại của bộ "Crush Của Tôi là Một Đứa Lẳng Lơ" cộng thêm một chương để kết thúc dòng thời gian này. Ngoài ra còn có thêm một cái phỏng vấn về phò (tất nhiên tôi sẽ đéo dịch vì đéo liên quan) và oneshot đầu tay của tác giả tên là "Mưu Sinh" (cái này ai muốn làm thì nhắn tôi tôi gửi raw đẹp cho chứ tôi thì không làm đâu).

___
**Note:** Tất cả bản cũ từ chương 31-35 sẽ được chuyển qua đầu truyện này.

Cette créature est venue étudier l'âme humaine, et le jeune Kyû va rapidement se rendre compte qu'on peut facilement tomber amoureux d'un être pourtant dépourvu de cœur…

Maison d'édition FR : Delcourt/Tonkam
description.ja: プール帰りの小学生・宇佐美九が出会ったのは、「心」を学びに来たロボットの少女・いちこ。一緒に暮らすことになった二人を待つのは...。ボーイミーツロボットガール、開演！

description.pt-br:
Ichiko, uma garota robô, conhece Kyuu, um humano, e as engrenagens que nunca haviam se movido começam a funcionar.

Durante as férias de verão, uma robô com aparência humana passa a viver com Kyuu Usami, um garoto que, até então, morava apenas com sua mãe. Kyuu é atraído pela garota, que está tentando entender o "coração". Ela, por sua vez, nutre pelo rapaz um amor infantil. Pouco a pouco, o sentimento cresce e os envolve... Boy meets robot girl, que comece o espetáculo! [Planet Mangá]

description.es-la: Un virgen estudiante de secundaria, por casualidad descubre a la gal de la que se estaba empezando a enamorar teniendo sexo con otro estudiante.
description.pt-br: Uma Gal safada que deixa todo mundo transar com ela e um garoto virgem do ensino médio apaixonado por ela, mesmo depois de vê-la transar com seu colega de classe.

title.en: The Male Leads Trapped in My House

description.en:
I reincarnated as the heiress of a powerful conglomerate family in a novel.  
The problem is, this world is about to be destroyed by monstrous viruses.  

With nothing but money to spare, I quickly bought a mansion in the countryside to build a shelter to escape the monsters…  
But the world ended far sooner than I had anticipated. Damn it!  

*  

On top of that, somehow, the male leads ended up trapped in my house with me.  
And these guys don’t seem to have any intention of leaving.  
Why do they look like they have no plans to go to the female lead?  

“Who exactly are you?”  
“You seem like someone who knew the world was going to end beforehand.”  

They were full of questions about me, but I couldn’t answer them. They wouldn’t believe me anyway.  
Right now, all I see them as is a good source of labor.  

“Alright, let’s work. You need to earn your keep for what you eat!”  

If I can find the cure for the virus causing the apocalypse, this hellish time will finally end.  
So, until then, I’ll make use of the male leads and hang on!  

*  

But one problem has come up.  
It turns out that this old mansion I purchased is far more suspicious than I thought.  
What on earth is happening in my house?

altTitles.ja: ヴェール

description.en:
"He", a police officer on his shift, happened to meet "her" on the streets, by chance.

Through its bold yet delicate brushwork and elegant prose, this stylish, full-colour comic
illustrates the subtle air of intimacy between these two individuals.

---
A chance encounter. A handsome policeman. A beautiful woman. A tentative love affair smolders on the snowy cobblestone streets, 
out of sight from those that might keep them apart. 

*Veil* is a beautifully illustrated full-color romance manga, told in stylish short vignettes, beautiful illustrations, and secret moments.
description.pt-br: Eles se conheceram na rua por acaso. Ele era policial e ela caminhava pela rua. Através de suas pinceladas ousadas, mas delicadas e diálogos elegantes, esta história refinada e colorida, ilustra o ar sutil da intimidade presente entre os dois.

description.en: A girl in a maid uniform came to Hitoyoshi's house looking for a job. Her previous job was an assassin, and she is skilled in all the deadly arts, but she's a complete beginner at housework. Hitoyoshi was confused by the strange request and sent her away. But then she saved Hitoyoshi from a deadly accident, and he thought maybe they can make this work? This is a story about a maid who was a cold-hearted killer learning about new emotions. A maid who lived a lonely life in the underworld finally finding family. The start of an enjoyable daily life.
description.id: ||Seorang gadis dengan pakaian pelayan datang ke rumah Hitoyoshi untuk mencari pekerjaan. Pekerjaan dia sebelumnya adalah seorang pembunuh, dan dia sangat ahli dalam semua teknik membunuh, tapi dia sangat awam dalam pekerjaan rumah. Hitoyoshi bingung dengan permintaan anehnya itu dan memintanya pergi. Tapi kemudian gadis itu menyelamatkan Hitoyoshi dari sebuah kecelakaan maut, dan Hitoyoshi pikir dia mungkin bisa mempekerjakannya? Ini adalah kisah tentang seorang pelayan yang dulunya adalah pembunuh berdarah dingin kini belajar tentang emosi baru. Seorang pelayan yang hidup kesepian di dunia bawah akhirnya menemukan keluarga. Awal kehidupan sehari-hari yang menyenangkan dimulai!||

altTitles.ja: ブルーピリオド

description.de:
Sieh die Welt mit neuen Augen!

Yataro Yaguchi hat gute Noten – aber keine Leidenschaft. Er trinkt, raucht und treibt sich bis nachts in der Stadt herum. Aber glücklich macht ihn das nicht. Und nun, kurz vor dem Schulabschluss, muss er sich fragen, ob das wirklich alles ist, was er vom Leben zu erwarten hat.

Da kommt er durch einen Zufall mit der Malerei in Kontakt – und plötzlich sieht er die Welt mit anderen Augen. Ohne jede Erfahrung beschließt er, sich für eine Kunstakademie zu bewerben. Doch die Aufnahmeprüfung ist hart… und ihm bleibt nicht mehr viel Zeit!
description.en:
Yatora is the perfect high school student, with good grades and lots of friends. It’s an effortless performance, and, ultimately…a dull one. But he wanders into the art room one day, and a lone painting captures his eye, awakening him to a kind of beauty he never knew. Compelled and consumed, he dives in headfirst — and he’s about to learn how savage and unforgiving art can be!

---
- **Won the 13th Manga Taisho Award in 2020**  
- **Won the 44th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2020**
description.es:
Es un estudiante de bachillerato espabilado, popular, que saca muy buenas notas y tiene ideas pragmáticas sobre su futuro. También bebe, fuma y sale de juerga por las noches. Y un día, de repente, descubre el gozo de dibujar.

¡Esta es la historia de superación de Yatora Yaguchi, repleta de vicisitudes en su camino para aprobar el examen de ingreso a una universidad de arte, en una versión de la tenacidad deportiva aplicada a las bellas artes!
description.fr:
Yatora est un lycéen studieux à qui tout réussit. Pourtant, il ressent depuis toujours une impression de vide en lui. Jusqu’au jour où, par hasard, il tombe sur un tableau qui le subjugue littéralement… Très vite, Yatora réalise que peindre est le seul moyen de faire passer ses émotions et de se révéler. Cet événement le pousse à se livrer corps et âme à la peinture pour tenter le concours d’entrée de la plus sélective des écoles de Beaux-arts !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.it:
Un liceale dalla vita piena, che prende buoni voti, sa sempre come cavarsela, beve, fuma e ama la vita notturna... un bel giorno, sente dentro di sè risvegliarsi la passione per il disegno. Inizia così la storia di un ragazzo che farà ardere la propria gioventù, aspirando a entrare in un'università d'arte!

Prima tiratura con in regalo il Quaderno d'artista.
description.ja: 成績優秀かつスクールカースト上位の充実した毎日を送りつつ、どこか空虚な焦燥感を感じて生きる高校生・矢口八虎（やぐち　やとら）は、ある日、一枚の絵に心奪われる。その衝撃は八虎を駆り立て、美しくも厳しい美術の世界へ身を投じていく。美術のノウハウうんちく満載、美大を目指して青春を燃やすスポ根受験物語、八虎と仲間たちは「好きなこと」を支えに未来を目指す！
description.pl:
Ma doskonałe stopnie i świetnie radzi sobie w życiu towarzyskim. Czasami pije, pali i bawi się do białego rana. Jest popularny. Nie można sobie wyobrazić lepszych doświadczeń w liceum, więc dlaczego ktoś taki nagle zapałał miłością do sztuki?!

Oto początek opowieści o młodym, przepełnionym pasją chłopaku, który celuje w uniwersytet sztuki, i jego walecznych przygotowaniach do egzaminów wstępnych na studia!
description.pt: Excelentes notas e sociável. Por que esse estudante colegial popular que ama beber, fumar e sair à noite e parecia estar satisfeito com sua vida despertou para a alegria de pintar? A história de um jovem vestibulando que está dando tudo de si para entrar na Universidade de Artes começa aqui!
description.ru:
Можно ли увлечься чем-то настолько, что ради этого вдруг решишь свернуть с намеченного ранее жизненного пути? Если вдруг поймешь, что выбранная до этого дорога, хоть и сулила благополучие в будущем, но не отражала истинного желания?  
С виду безалаберный Ятора Ягути на удивление своих друзей-разгильдяев преуспел в учёбе и по окончании школы мог поступить почти в любой университет. Однако сам парень большой радости от этого не испытывал. Велика задача — подтянуть предметы, нужно только приложить немного больше усилий, чем остальные. Скучно. Да и по мнению парня, гордиться тут нечем…  
Жгучая потребность в самореализации и отсутствие очевидного способа самовыражения так и довлели бы над Яторой, если бы однажды вечером пагубная привычка не привела его в школьный клуб изобразительного искусства. Увидев там картину Мори, он решает попробовать запечатлеть на холсте приглянувшийся ему городской пейзаж. Неумелая, нелепая, но старательно написанная картина всё же достигает сердец некоторых людей, и парень понимает, что таким образом, через искусство, может по-настоящему общаться с другими.  
Так стоит ли ради этого сворачивать с намеченного пути, даже если, вполне возможно, эта другая дорога в конце концов приведёт к пропасти?
description.th:
คะแนนสอบเป็นเลิศ มนุษยสัมพันธ์กับใครรอบข้างก็ไปได้ดี กินเหล้า สูบบุหรี่ เที่ยวกลางคืนทำได้ทุกอย่าง เพื่อนๆ ต่างก็สนิทสนมเชื่อใจ เขาเป็นเด็กผู้ชายในวัยม.ปลายที่ชีวิตดูกำลังไปได้สวยคนหนึ่ง

ทว่ามาวันหนึ่งเขากลับเพิ่งรู้ตัว่า ตนเองนั้นชอบวาดภาพ!?

สุดยอดมังงะที่ตีแผ่เรื่องราวของเหล่าคนที่มุ่งมั่นในการสอบเข้ามหา'ลัยศิลปะ เปี่ยมล้นไปด้วยพลังของช่วงชีวิตวัยรุ่นเปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!
description.tr:
Lisenin sondan bir önceki sınıfında, çalışkan ama isteksiz Yatora Yaguchi, kendini sanat ile keşfediyor. Daha önce deneyimi olmamasıyla birlikte, bir sanat üniversitesine girmek için çalışmaya başlıyor. Fakat bu seçimin korkunç sonuçları da olabilir.

- 2020 13. Manga Taisho Ödülleri kazananı.  
- 2020 44. Kodansha Manga Ödülleri "En İyi Manga" ödülü kazananı.
description.uk: Під час другого року старшої школи безпристрасний, але дуже старанний учень Ягучі Ятаро нарешті знаходить своє покликання у мистецтві. Не маючи досвіду у цій сфері, він приймає рішення плідно працювати, щоб вступити до університету мистецтв. Рішення з потенціально катастрофічними наслідками.
description.pt-br:
Em seu segundo ano do ensino médio, o desapaixonado mas estudioso, Yataro Yaguchi finalmente se encontra em arte. Sem nenhuma experiencia anterior em arte, ele decide trabalhar com o objetivo de ingressar em uma universidade de arte. Uma decisão com resultados potencialmente desastrosos.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 6, Cap 25. ]
description.zh-hk: 矢口八虎雖然像個不良少年，愛喝酒抽菸和朋友打混，但在學校卻是個成績優異、深受歡迎的學生，然而他卻對這種空虛無趣的生活感到焦躁。某一天在美術社中，看見學姊美麗的油畫，以及美術老師那番建言，讓他決心想嘗試畫畫這條路。在作畫的過程中，也重新發現自我，從中找到人生的意義與目標，就此開啟了考美術大學的努力之路。

description.en: Strange bunny girls have been appearing all over the city, attempting to recruit people into a mysterious cult known as "The Warren Divine".

title.en: Kino no Tabi - the Beautiful World (Shiomiya)

altTitles.ja: キノの旅 -the Beautiful World-

altTitles.fr: L'odyssée de Kino - Un monde magnifique

description.en:
Destination is a state of mind. A tale of one girl and her bike and the road ahead. Kino wanders around the world on the back of Hermes, her unusual, anthropomorphic motorcycle, only staying in each country for three days. During their adventures, they find happiness, sadness, pain, decadence, violence, beauty, and wisdom. But through it all, they never lose their sense of freedom. They discover that because of the world's imperfections, it is actually a thing of beauty. "The world is not beautiful, therefore it is."
___
[Alt Official English (Kodansha USA)](https://kodansha.us/series/kinos-journey/)
description.pt-br: Destino é um estado de espírito. Um conto de uma garota e sua moto e a estrada à frente. Kino vagueia pelo mundo na garupa de Hermes, sua motocicleta incomum e antropomórfica, permanecendo em cada país apenas por três dias. Durante suas aventuras, eles encontram felicidade, tristeza, dor, decadência, violência, beleza e sabedoria. Mas, apesar de tudo, eles nunca perdem seu senso de liberdade. Eles descobrem que, por causa das imperfeições do mundo, ele é, na verdade, uma coisa bela. "O mundo não é bonito, portanto, é."

altTitles.ja: Tomo Chan ha Onnanoko!
トモちゃんは女の子!

description.en: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

altTitles.ja: 夢でフラれてはじまる百合

altTitles.en: Our Yuri Started with Me Getting Rejected in a Dream

altTitles.en: Yuri That Starts With Getting Rejected In a Dream

altTitles.fr: Notre histoire commença lorsque ma confession fut rejetée dans mes rêves

altTitles.zh: 从梦里被拒绝开始的百合

altTitles.fr: Notre relation Yuri a commencé lorsque ma confession s'est fait rejeter dans mes rêves.
Notre histoire saphique commença lorsque ma déclaration amoureuse ne fut pas réciproque dans mon rêve

description.en:
For your very average high school girl, Tsukushi, there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream.   The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden, and a cool girl which begins with a dream, starts right now!

 [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)
description.id: Tsukushi bermimpi ditolak saat menyatakan cintanya pada sahabatnya, Hinoka. Satu mimpi yang akan selalu menghantuinya, dan membuatnya mulai melihat Hinoka dengan cara yang berbeda.

altTitles.ja: WOLF IN THE HOUSE：ウルフ・イン・ザ・ハウス

description.en: After ending an on-again, off-again relationship of 10 years, Minsuk decides to foster a Siberian husky named Bexan to mark the start of his new single life. He can’t wait to cuddle with his new furry roommate, take him on walks, and play fetch. But Bexan is no ordinary dog…and when night falls, Minsuk is in for a surprise.
description.pl:
: ||  
Po zakończeniu 10-letniego związku, Minsuk postanawia zaadoptować syberyjskiego husky, o imieniu Bexan, aby uczcić początek jego nowego życia jako singiel. Nie może się doczekać, by przytulić się do swojego futrzanego współlokatora, zabierać go na spacery i bawić się z nim w aport. Lecz Bexan nie jest zwykłym psem…i kiedy zapada zmrok, na Minsuka czeka niespodzianka.||  
  
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://www.lezhin.com/ja/comic/with)
